disease: Unspecified malignant neoplasm of skin of left lower eyelid, including canthus

physical_findings: Skin lesion on the left lower eyelid, possibly involving the canthus

required: Histopathological confirmation of malignant neoplasm of the skin
supportive: Clinical findings consistent with a skin lesion on the left lower eyelid, including the canthus

differential_diagnoses: Malignant neoplasm of skin of genital organs (C51-C52, C60.-, C63.2)
Malignant neoplasm of connective tissue of eyelid (C49.0)
